official_title: A joint resolution to commemorate the 100th birthday of Aldo Leopold and to recognize his contribution to the protection and wise management of renewable natural resources.

summary.text: Gives special recognition to the achievements of wilderness ecologist Aldo Leopold. Urges Federal land management agencies to model their activities after the conservation ethic he inspired.

titles.title: A joint resolution to commemorate the 100th birthday of Aldo Leopold and to recognize his contribution to the protection and wise management of renewable natural resources.
